sentence.Network_en: The light went out, and the room was plunged into darkness.
sentence.Network_cn: 灯熄了，屋里陷入一片漆黑。

sentence.Network_en: At that instant the museum was plunged into total darkness.
sentence.Network_cn: 就在那时，博物馆陷入了一片漆黑。

sentence.Network_en: The baby was filled with alarm at the darkness and the noise.
sentence.Network_cn: 在黑暗和嘈杂的声音中，婴儿饱受惊吓。

星辰泣血（Redstar，红色的星辰）指的是那颗彗星，而异鬼和即将到来的寒冬就是无尽的黑暗（darkness），如同长夜降临时一样。 …
高中英语新课程标准词汇表 ... dark n. 黑暗；暗处；日暮 darkness n. 黑暗，阴暗 dash v. & n. 快跑，冲刺，短跑.
darkness的意思_百度知道 ... pitch darkness 漆黑, 极黑 darkness 盲目 Egyptian darkness 漆黑, 伸手不见掌.

list.abs: 暗之魂(dark soul) 技能说明：发射暗属性球，对敌人造成多段暗属性魔法伤害，爆炸会造成更大的暗属性魔法伤害。
在两人努力之下，终于吸出了布鲁士身上的黑暗灵魂(Dark Soul)，洛克人也马上攻击打掉了黑暗灵魂。然后到司令室相讨，再回到家 …
暗物质（dark matter），在宇宙学中又称为暗质，是指无法通过电磁波的观测进行研究，也就是不与电磁力产生作用的物质。人们已 …
体育项目的英语怎么说 ... 承担义务 to undertake obligation 黑马 dark horse 冷门 an unexpected winner;dark horse.
《黑暗阴影》（Dark Shadows）根据60年代同名超自然电视剧改编，该剧长达1225集，是一部气氛阴森的电视剧，几乎集合了所有哥 …

entry.def: When it is dark, there is not enough light to see properly, for example because it is night.

example.ex: When she awoke it was evening and already dark...
example.tran: 她醒来时已是晚上，天已经黑了。

example.ex: It was too dark inside to see much...
example.tran: 里面太暗，看不太清。

entry.def: The dark is the lack of light in a place.

example.ex: Her mother was sitting in the dark by the stove in her rocking chair...
example.tran: 她母亲坐在炉边暗处的摇椅里。

example.ex: I've always been afraid of the dark.
example.tran: 我一直很怕黑。

entry.def: If you describe something as dark, you mean that it is black in colour, or a shade that is close to black.

example.ex: He wore a dark suit and carried a black attaché case...
example.tran: 他身穿暗色西服，手提黑色公文包。

example.ex: The heavy dark table is inlaid with lighter wood.
example.tran: 笨重的深色桌子上嵌有颜色较浅的木头。

entry.def: When you use dark to describe a colour, you are referring to a shade of that colour which is close to black, or seems to have some black in it.

example.ex: She was wearing a dark blue dress.
example.tran: 她穿着一件深蓝色的礼服。

entry.tran: (头发、眼睛或肤色)棕色的，黑色的
entry.def: If someone has dark hair, eyes, or skin, they have brown or black hair, eyes, or skin.

example.ex: He had dark, curly hair...
example.tran: 他有一头卷曲的黑发。

example.ex: Leo went on, his dark eyes wide with pity and concern.
example.tran: 利奥接着说下去，他的黑眼睛瞪得大大的，充满怜悯和关切。

entry.tran: (白人）有着棕色（或黑色）头发（且皮肤略带棕色）的，肤色深的
entry.def: If you describe a white person as dark, you mean that they have brown or black hair, and often a brownish skin.

example.ex: Carol is a tall, dark, Latin type of woman...
example.tran: 卡萝尔身材高大，黑发棕肤，是个有着拉丁风情的女子。

example.ex: The driver was very dark. Maltese, maybe.
example.tran: 司机一头乌发、肤色黝黑，可能是个马耳他人。

entry.def: A dark period of time is unpleasant or frightening.

example.ex: Once again there's talk of very dark days ahead...
example.tran: 又有传言说以后的日子会非常艰难。

example.ex: This was the darkest period of the war.
example.tran: 这是那次战争中最黑暗的时期。

entry.def: A dark place or area is mysterious and not fully known about.

example.ex: The spacecraft is set to throw new light on to a dark corner of the solar system.
example.tran: 这艘宇宙飞船可能会让人们对太阳系中的一个神秘角落有更新的认识。

example.ex: ...the dark recesses of the mind.
example.tran: 隐秘的思想深处

entry.def: Dark thoughts are sad, and show that you are expecting something unpleasant to happen.

example.ex: Troy's chatter kept me from thinking dark thoughts.
example.tran: 特洛伊的喋喋不休让我暂时收起了阴郁思绪。

entry.tran: (眼神或话语）阴险的，邪恶的，不祥的
entry.def: Dark looks or remarks make you think that the person giving them wants to harm you or that something horrible is going to happen.

example.ex: Garin shot him a dark glance, as if in warning.
example.tran: 加林恶狠狠地瞪了他一眼，似乎是在警告。

example.ex: ...dark threats.
example.tran: 恶毒的威胁

entry.tran: （指与严肃或令人不快的事物相关的)黑色的
entry.def: If you describe something as dark, you mean that it is related to things that are serious or unpleasant, rather than light-hearted.

example.ex: Their dark humor never failed to astound him...
example.tran: 他们的黑色幽默总能让他咋舌。

example.ex: Nina took a kind of dark pleasure in being the focus of the tension between her father and her brother.
example.tran: 对成了父亲和哥哥紧张关系的焦点，尼娜有点幸灾乐祸。

entry.def: If you do something after dark, you do it when the sun has set and night has begun.

example.ex: They avoid going out alone after dark.
example.tran: 他们避免在天黑以后独自外出。

entry.def: If you do something before dark, you do it before the sun sets and night begins.

example.ex: They'll be back well before dark.
example.tran: 他们会在天黑前早早返回。

entry.def: If you are in the dark about something, you do not know anything about it.

example.ex: The investigators admit that they are completely in the dark about the killing...
example.tran: 调查人员承认他们对这起谋杀一无所知。

example.ex: I managed to keep my parents in the dark about this...
example.tran: 我设法对父母瞒下了此事。

entry.def: If you describe something someone says or does as a shot in the dark or a stab in the dark, you mean they are guessing that what they say is correct or that what they do will be successful.

example.ex: Every single one of those inspired guesses had been shots in the dark.
example.tran: 所有那些凭直觉的猜测都是无根据的瞎猜。

means.word_mean: 3. absence of moral or spiritual values;

sentences.sentence: "he was in the dark concerning their intentions"

means.word_mean: 5. having a dark or somber color

auth_sentence.content: 'Yesterday a shaft of light cut into the darkness.
auth_sentence.res_content: 'Yesterday a shaft of light cut into the darkness.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: 'Yesterday a shaft of light cut into the darkness.

auth_sentence.content: In place of dawn, there was only darkness.
auth_sentence.res_content: In place of dawn, there was only darkness.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In place of dawn, there was only darkness.

auth_sentence.content: The giant planes climbed into the darkness and disappeared.
auth_sentence.res_content: The giant planes climbed into the darkness and disappeared.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The giant planes climbed into the darkness and disappeared.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 表名词,"性质,状态",通常加在形容词后面

stems_affixes.word_buile: bright明亮的+ness性质,状态→n.明亮,辉煌,聪明
busi+ness性质,状态→n.商业,买卖,交易,生意
careful小心的,仔细的+ness性质,状态→n.仔细,慎重
clean清洁+li+ness性质,状态→cleanliness洁癖,清洁

stems_affixes.value_cn: 意识,知觉,自觉,觉悟,个人思想
stems_affixes.word_buile: conscious意识到的+ness性质,状态→n.意识,知觉,自觉,觉悟,个人思想
dark黑暗+ness性质,状态→n.黑暗,阴暗,秘密
empty空的+ness性质,状态→emptiness空虚,无知
firm坚定+ness性质,状态→n.坚定,稳固
forward向前的,鲁莽的+ness性质,状态→n.大胆,鲁莽
fulsome过度的,虚假的+ness性质,状态→n.虚情,谄媚

stems_affixes.value_cn: 仁慈,亲切;好意;友好行为
stems_affixes.word_buile: kind仁慈的,和蔼的+ness性质,状态→n.仁慈,亲切;好意;友好行为
like像+ness性质,状态→n.相象,相似物
polite有礼貌的+ness性质,状态→n.有礼,优雅
positive肯定的+ness性质,状态→n.肯定,信心
pretentious自命不凡的+ness性质,状态→n.自命不凡
prompt敏捷的,迅速的,即时的+ness性质,状态→n.敏捷,迅速
tight紧的+ness性质,状态→n.坚固,紧密
tired疲乏的+ness性质,状态→n.疲劳,疲倦
useful有用的+ness性质,状态→n.有用,有效性
useless无用的+ness性质,状态→n.无用
weak弱的,虚弱的+ness性质,状态→n.虚弱,软弱,弱点,缺点
thick厚的+ness性质,状态→n.厚度,浓度,稠密

sentences.en: A figure appeared out of the darkness.
sentences.cn: 黑暗中冒出一个人影来。

sentences.en: A man loomed up out of the darkness.
sentences.cn: 一个男人隐隐出现在黑暗中。

sentences.en: An oil lamp burned in the darkness.
sentences.cn: 一盏油灯在黑暗中发着光。

sentences.en: A small party stole up on the bridge under cover of darkness.
sentences.cn: 一支小分队乘黑夜偷袭了那座桥梁。

sentences.en: As darkness closed about them,they decided to return home.
sentences.cn: 当夜幕降临时,他们决定回家。

sentences.en: A power failure plunged the whole house into sudden darkness.
sentences.cn: 停电了,整个房子突然陷入一片漆黑之中。

sentences.en: The islanders used to live in darkness.
sentences.cn: 岛上的居民过去一直生活在愚昧之中。
